entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,239001}Our fifth son, who chose upheaval...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,218}{F813,0,239002}...Your actions are abominable.{F801}No matter how much you struggle,{F801}your despair will never be healed.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,218}{F813,0,239002}...Your actions are abominable.{F801}No matter how much you struggle,{F801}your despair will never be healed.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,218}{F813,0,239003}Very well... As your forebear, I will{F801}teach you...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,239004}The splendor of nonexistence...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,218}{F813,0,239003}Very well... As your forebear, I will{F801}teach you...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,239004}The splendor of nonexistence...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}"God's curse", eh? That's merely a{F801}convenient turn of phrase.{F801}{F802}They should blame their own weakness{F801}instead, for not being able to sever{F801}that curse.{F801}{F802}Improving oneself to become better{F801}than others is how a real man lives.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}"God's curse", eh? That's merely a{F801}convenient turn of phrase.{F801}{F802}They should blame their own weakness{F801}instead, for not being able to sever{F801}that curse.{F801}{F802}Improving oneself to become better{F801}than others is how a real man lives.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}
